sen.j: 遠藤 謹助(えんどうきんすけ、男性、1836年（天保7年）2月15日 - 1893年（明治26年）)は、明治時代の長州藩出身の官僚で長州五傑の一人。

sen.e: Kaoru INOUE and others greeted the admiral and the next day meeting between Takachika MORI and his son, and King was realized at the admiral room in English warship next day.

sen.j: しかし明治8年1月にはイギリス東洋銀行と契約を解消し、キンドル他9人のお雇い外国人が解雇されると、再び造幣局に戻る。

sen.j: 毎年4月中旬の1週間、局内の桜並木を一般公開する大阪造幣局「桜の通り抜け」は1883年に当時の局長だった遠藤の指示により始まり、現在も大阪の春の風物詩として継承されている。
sen.e: Each year for one week, in the middle of April, passing through the way with the row of cherry trees has been open to the public, and this custom began by the instruction of ENDO, Bureau Chief in those days and has been inherited as special Spring feature in Osaka even now.

The custom of making pathways lined with cherry trees in the site of the Osaka Mint Bureau open to the public for one week in the middle of April every year began in 1883 by the order of ENDO who was Bureau Chief then and has been inherited to be still enjoyed as a special spring feature in Osaka.
